long_description: With a women-specific fit, the lightweight Burton Total Impact shorts build extra protection right into your clothing, so you can take on gnarly tricks and terrain without extra bulk and weight. Breathable d3o(R) Flo Impact padding in key areas helps reduce impact from falls on the hips and tailbone. DRYRIDE Ultrawick(TM) lightweight fabric wicks moisture away to keep skin dry and comfortable.
short_description: With a women-specific fit, the lightweight Burton Total Impact shorts build extra protection right into your clothing, so you can take on gnarly tricks and terrain without extra bulk and weight.
